column4: ok.  im completly new to networking.  all im trying to do right now is set up a static IP so i can forward ports.  ive been leeching for the last couple weeks but now ive got a WRT54G.  how can i tell if im actually getting the connection from my router?
what are you trying to do?
set up my router that i just got.
setting up a wireless router right>
do you need to set it up on a windows computer first?
what kind of router is it?
but the wifi light is not flashing on the router, so i'm wondering if im still grabbing someone elses connection in a different apt.
ok well type iwconfig to see what network you are connected to
im in that, but it doesnt like list the available connections.
in properties of the wireless device there should be a pulldown menu for essid
it just says "any" and doesnt give any other options.
eth0      Failed to read scan data : Operation not supported
when you do iwconfig is this the device it shows?
yes.  its using eth0 to connect to my neighbor.
